members.name: getSystemId
members.comment: Returns the system ID of the XML data

members.name: getCharacterEncodingScheme
members.comment: Returns the encoding style of the XML data

members.name: encodingSet
members.comment: Returns true if CharacterEncodingScheme is set in the encoding declaration of the document

return: true if CharacterEncodingScheme is set, false otherwise

members.name: isStandalone
members.comment: Returns if this XML is standalone

return: the standalone state of XML, defaults to "no"

members.name: standaloneSet
members.comment: Returns true if the standalone attribute is set in the encoding declaration of the document.

return: true if the standalone attribute is set, false otherwise

members.name: getVersion
members.comment: Returns the version of XML of this XML stream

return: the version of XML, defaults to "1.0"

name: javax.xml.stream.events.StartDocument
comment: An interface for the start document event
